text: (pheraa) kxn hna phwk khea nan hmu chn khxng nuhˌ læa phlphrrkh tang «hlangcak phwk khea di ptiseth ma kxn læw læa thuk «prachachati di tangcı thi ca thalay lang rx sul khxng phwk khea læa totheiyng dwy khwam thec pheux thi ca lblang khwam cri ng hı suy sin pi dangnan kha cung di lngthosʹ phwk khea læw pen xyangri bang kar lngthosʹ khxng kha
